item.title: Innovationx client help
item.dc:creator: @dwinnerzscape dwinnerzscape
item.description:
@dwinnerzscape wrote:

[quote=“Gl Then Gf, post:7, topic:369749”][quote author=Gl Then Gf link=topic=465874.msg3412504#msg3412504 date=1290809218]
u have to connect through localhost or 127.0.0.1 not ur ip the other players do tht
[/quote]

As u can see 127.0.0.1 .NOT. ur ip - that is for other players to connect. get ur facts right.[/quote]
If you portfarwarded and did that stuff and got no-ip you can connect through the no-ip like
pkz-scape.no-ip.org and so can your players… u can connect with ur localhost but ur players cant…

Read full topic

item.title: Innovationx client help
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

First off you said you could NOT connect to your own server using your Ip From Well this is false You very much can.
I dont reccomend using innovation x even the unleeched version as it dident work to well for me (it said my server was offline even tho it was online)

item.title: Innovationx client help
item.dc:creator: @immortaliyftw immortaliyftw
item.description:
@immortaliyftw wrote:

Hello, I’d like to thank you in advance for reading this. I hope you can help me.

I downloaded the InnovationX client and I ran the InnovarionX server.

I edited the clients client.java like this

public URL getCodeBase()
{
if(signlink.mainapp != null)
return signlink.mainapp.getCodeBase();
try
{
return new URL("http:pked.no-ip.biz:" + (80));
}
catch(Exception _ex)
{
}
return null;
}
public String server = "pked.no-ip.biz";

Here is what it originally looked like:

public URL getCodeBase()
{
if(signlink.mainapp != null)
return signlink.mainapp.getCodeBase();
try
{
return new URL("http://www.play.innovation.org:" + (80));
}
catch(Exception _ex)
{
}
return null;
}
//public String server = "127.0.0.1";

I compiled then ran it. it still connectd through 127.0.0.1
So i found an online server and put its ip in place of pked ip both of them and compiled and ran it. It didnt connect to the other servers ip I put in but rather still my own from 127.0.0.1.

Thanks for reading hope you can help

Read full topic
